sources.title: Flying By | Full Drama Movie | Billy Ray Cyrus | Heather Locklear
sources.description:
**The film is under non-exclusive license from Artist View Entertainment Inc.  All rights reserved**

Flying By - This musically driven drama follows a successful Real Estate developer (Billy Ray Cyrus) who puts his marriage and business on the line when given the opportunity to follow his ultimate, life-long dream....music.

2009
Stars: Ahnaise Christmas, Mo Collins, Billy Ray Cyrus, Heather Locklear

metadata.Plot: A real estate developer goes to his 25th high school reunion without his wife, and finds his old teenage band playing. They get him up on stage for a couple of songs, and convince him come to a rehearsal. His wife is outraged that he played. His daughter thinks it's kind of cool. His Mother, in a retirement home, encourages him to enjoy life. He feels some temporary relief from the pressures of business complexities and the stress of marriage tensions. The band gets booked at a popular bar, which leads to a last minute booking to open for a reunion tour, with the possibility of additional tour dates. But the band has internal conflicts. He faces a tough decision to give it a shot even though it will affect his marriage, his family, particularly his daughter, and his business.
metadata.Actors: Billy Ray Cyrus, Heather Locklear, Patricia Neal
